metadata.title: CVE-2022-2211 on Ubuntu 21.10 (impish) - medium.
metadata.description: A vulnerability was found in libguestfs. This issue occurs while calculating the greatest possible number of matching keys in the get_keys() function. This flaw leads to a denial of service, either by mistake or malicious actor.

criterions.comment: libguestfs package in impish is affected and may need fixing.
